stats.headline: Documents don't need to be complicated
stats.subheadline: Kalygo saves you time so you can focus on what matters
stats.stat1_subheadline: Kalygo allows you to restructure your document review workflows to be 10x or even 100x faster than standard practices
stats.stat2_subheadline: That means more time for your family, friends, exercise, extracurriculars, business development, sunshine, and much more
stats.stat3_subheadline: Leverage software, AI, and collaboration all at once to boost your or your team's productivity today

pricing.title: Pricing
pricing.tier1_feature0: 3 free credits issued on signup so you can test out the platform
pricing.tier1_feature4: Refer friends to be eligible to win more free credits
pricing.tier2_feature0: Equates to processing ~1,039 pages with GPT-3 or ~40 pages with GPT-4
pricing.tier2_feature2: Paid features disabled when credits run out
pricing.tier3_feature0: Equates to processing ~2,078 pages with GPT-3 or ~81 pages with GPT-4
pricing.tier3_feature2: Paid features disabled when credits run out
